name: Council of Gas Detection and Environmental Monitoring
goal: CoGDEM is a trade association representing manufacturers and other experts in the field of gas detection apparatus.
interests: Energy, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Involvement with Directives such as ATEX, EMC, LVD, GAD, WEEE, RoHS, and all relevant CENELEC standards and working groups.  Carbon Monoxide Round Table events for MEPs. Pushing for EN 50291 to be listed under the Construction Products Regulations.
